PARIS21 produces the Partner Report on Support to Statistics (PRESS) annually to report on trends in 
support  to  statistics.  The  methodology  is  applied  retrospectively  for  all  previous  years  to  ensure comparability over time. This document presents the methodology used in PRESS.
